function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of Aedes mosquitoes in Europe","Impact":"Local transmission of dengue virus in Europe","Mitigation":"Implement vector control measures and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Insecticides, mosquito traps, public health surveillance systems","People":"Residents and travelers in Europe","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and local communities"},{"Description":"International travel and transmission of DENV","Impact":"Introduction of dengue virus by infected travelers","Mitigation":"Implement surveillance and monitoring of travelers from dengue-endemic regions","Technologies":"Travel screening, rapid diagnostic tests, public health information dissemination","People":"International travelers, local populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, border control agencies"},{"Description":"Historical local transmission events","Impact":"Risk of recurrent local transmission outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enhance early detection and response capabilities, improve public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance systems, outbreak response protocols, communication networks","People":"Residents and travelers in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, and health facilities"}]}
